original: Lindahl, Karl Johan Elias, fd. folkskolinspektör, Norrköping, f. 17/4/81 i Växjö av Samuel L. o. Maria Ahlberg. G. 1. 08 m. Hanna Jönsson, d. 41; 2. 43 ^ m. Ruth Wittmark. Barn: Birgit f. 09, skolköks- o. handarb :lär., g. 33 m. rektor Thor sten Åberg, Karl-Erik 12, ing., Britt-Stina 17, fil. mag., Karl-Love 21, civ:ing., lantmät. — Mog:ex. i Växjö 00, folkskoll :ex. där 01, kyr-kosångarex. 02, fil. kand. i Lund 08. E. o. lär. v. Växjö folksk. 01-02, ord. dito 03-09, lär. v. Växjö tekn. yrkes-sk. 04-09, förest, o. förste lär. v. An-derslövs h. folksk. 09-11, rektor o-, ämneslär. v. Nybro komm. mellansk. 11-16, folksk :insp. i östergötl. östra insp :omr. 16-46, vik. o. e. undervisn :-råd samt led. av skolöverstyr. v. skilda tillf, sammani. över tre år sed. 19, sakk. i ecklidep. f. utredn. av viss skolfråga 21-22. Ordf. i Nybro före-;läsn:fören. o. bibl:styr. 12-16, i styr. :f. komm. mellansk. där 15-16, i kyr-I kobyggn :komm. o. pens:nd, dir. o. |ordf, i styr. f. Nybro brunn o. bad-anst. 16, ombud f. tryckta skr. i Nybro fyra år, led. av Norrköp. stads-fullm. (fp.) 35-42, insp. f. komm. mellansk., prakt, mellansk. samt h. folksk. i Norrköp. sed. 36. Skr.: Nybro brunn o. badanst. (33), årsberätt. f. sk. i Anderslöv o. Nybro, upps. o. föredrag i skolfrågor i mötesberätt., tidn., saml :verk m. m. Utg. tills. m. Britta Wittmark o. Ruth Wittmark-Lindah’1: Min skrivbok, övn :bok i rationell välskrivn. RVO.
translated: Lindahl, Karl Johan Elias, former school inspector, Norrköping, b. 17/4/81 in Växjö to Samuel L. and Maria Ahlberg. Married 1st in 1908 to Hanna Jönsson, d. 1941; 2nd in 1943 to Ruth Wittmark. Children: Birgit b. 1909, cooking and handicraft teacher, married in 1933 to principal Thorsten Åberg, Karl-Erik b. 1912, engineer, Britt-Stina b. 1917, Master of Arts, Karl-Love b. 1921, civil engineer, surveyor. Completed exams in Växjö in 1900, primary school exam in 1901, choir singer exam in 1902, Bachelor of Arts in Lund in 1908. Temporary and regular teacher at Växjö primary school from 1901-1909, teacher at Växjö technical vocational school from 1904-1909, principal and subject teacher at Anderslöv primary school from 1909-1911, principal and subject teacher at Nybro municipal middle school from 1911-1916, school inspector in the eastern part of Östergötland from 1916-1946, acting and permanent education council member, and member of the school management board at various times over three years since 1919, expert in the Department of Ecclesiastical Affairs for a certain school question investigation from 1921-1922. Chairman of Nybro lecture association and library board from 1912-1916, member of the board of Nybro municipal middle school from 1915-1916, in the church construction committee and pension board, director and chairman of the board of Nybro spa and bathing establishment in 1916, representative for printed writings in Nybro for four years, member of Norrköping city council (progressive party) from 1935-1942, inspector for municipal middle school, practical middle school, and higher primary school in Norrköping since 1936. Writings: "Nybro spa and bathing establishment" (1933), annual report for schools in Anderslöv and Nybro, essays and lectures on educational issues in meeting reports, newspapers, anthologies, etc. Co-authored with Britta Wittmark and Ruth Wittmark-Lindahl: "My Writing Book," exercise book in efficient penmanship, RVO.
